Description: Find mug in room, put it under the coffeemachine. Turn on coffeemachine.

Find sink in room. Turn faucet on. Allow water to fill sinkbasin. Add 2 squirts from soapbottle into water. Turn faucet off. Find dirty plates. Put plates in water in sinkbasin. Find dirty bowls. Put bowls in sinkbasin. Use dishsponge to wipe plates down with soapy water. Use dishsponge to wipe bowls down with soapy water. Remove from water. Allow to dry.
Find apple in room. Use knife to cut apples into slices. Put apple slices on plate.

Find bread in room. Take slice of bread to toaster. Put bread in toaster. Push button to start toaster. Remove toasted bread from toaster when the toaster signals it is ready. Put toasted bread on plate.

Find egg in room. Find pan in room. Take pan and egg to stove. Place pan on stove. Turn stove on. Crack egg and put into pan. Use spatula to flip egg over. Remove egg from pan with spatula. Place egg on plate.

Find tomatoes in room. Find pot in room. Cut tomatoes into pieces with knife. Put tomatoes in pot. Add a sprinkle of contents of saltshaker to pot. Add a sprinkle of contents of peppershaker to pot. Take pot to sink. Use faucet to add water to pot. Put pot on stove. Turn stove on using stoveknob. Stir ingredients of pot with spoon, breaking up tomatoes. Bring contents of pot to a boil then reduce to a simmer. Stir with spoon occasionally. Use stoveknob to turn off stove when tomatoes are cooked down to desired consistency.

ind lettuce in room. Find pot in room. Cut lettuce into pieces with knife. Put lettuce in pot. Add a sprinkle of contents of saltshaker to pot. Add a sprinkle of contents of peppershaker to pot. Take pot to sink. Use faucet to add water to pot. Put pot on stove. Turn stove on using stoveknob. Stir ingredients of pot with spoon. Bring contents of pot to a boil then reduce to a simmer. Stir with spoon occasionally. Use stoveknob to turn off stove when lettuce is soft.
Find pot in room. Take pot to sink. Use faucet to add water to pot. Put pot on stove. Turn stove on using stoveknob. Bring contents of pot to a boil. Turn stove off using stoveknob.
Find cracked egg in room. Take egg to bin and put inside.
Find fridge in room. Open door of fridge. Remove lettuce and egg from fridge.
Put the sliced potato in the plate. Put that plate in microwave. turn on the microwave.
Locate the wine bottle on the table. Find cup in kitchen. Open the wine bottle and pour the wine into cup.
Choose the food items that is needed to be refrigerated. Place items on plate and open fridge. Place the items in fridge.
Open the kitchen cabinet and take a cup. Open the tap and fill the cup with water.
Pick the potato from the table. Was the potato with water in the sink. Put potato in bowl and put on the stove.
Locate the unused apple slices and check for unused slices. Throw these into the dustbin.
Pick the kitchen utensils from table and kitchen counter. Open the cabinet drawer and check for available space. Put the kitchen utensils in the cabinet.

Task: Pour away coffee in a cup_17_7
Description: Locate the coffee machine and also the coffee cup on the kitchen counter. Pour coffee from jug to the cup.
Pick the pot from the stove and take it near sink. Pour water into the sink.
Locate the Light switch on the wall. Turn the button off.
Locate laptop. Sit down at table. Open laptop. Push power button to turn laptop on. Use laptop.
Locate television. Walk to television. Push on button on television. Locate remote. Pick up remote. Sit on armchair. Use remote to find desired channel.

Task: Check the timing on the watch_205_7
Description: Locate watch. Look at watch to check the time.
Locate box. Put candle in box. Put creditcard in box. Put keychain in box. Put tissuebox in box. Put remote in box. Close box lid.
Locate used tissuebox. Pick up used tissuebox. Walk to bin. Place tissuebox in bin.

Task: Turn off the table lamp or desk lamp_211_7
Description: Switch of the light switch on the table lamp or desk lamp.
Take the hand phone crack its screen by hitting hard with the key chain or remote.
Firstly take the hand phone and open it with the passcode or pattern. Then use it for required purposes.
Take off all the things on the sofa and clear it. Clean the sofa.
Pick up book from table, open book and read it.
